questions.question: This arc takes place on an island inhabited by giants and involves a struggle against a corrupt government official. What is...?
This arc takes the Straw Hat Pirates to a sky island where they face off against a self-proclaimed God with lightning powers. What is...?
Taking place on a ghostly island, this arc introduces a skeleton musician and features battles against zombie-like enemies. What is...?
This power allows its user to manipulate darkness and gravity, famously held by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This is the technique used by Monkey D. Luffy that allows him to drastically increase his muscle mass and size. What is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is an expert sniper known for his long nose and dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea. Who is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
